event.title: a fire at 2:46 a.m. Saturday, March 21

data.event: Nathan Skaggs, 2; Patrick Snelling, 8; Breonna Snelling, 10; and Cassandra Karg, 10, died in a fire at 2:46 a.m. Saturday, March 21, at 11690 U.S. 36, Lot No. 15, in the St. Paris Court West mobile home park, just west of St. Paris, according to the Champaign County Sheriff's Office.
Phillip Skaggs Jr., 33; Christina Gregg, 33; and Natalia Skaggs, 8-months, escaped.

event.title: moved into the mobile home a few months ago

data.event: The family moved into the mobile home a few months ago and the children are good friends with Randall's son.

event.title: stopped by their home Friday night

data.event: Brandyberry stopped by their home Friday night, ate some cookies and talked with them.

event.title: visited Gregg at Mercy Memorial Hospital on Saturday morning

data.event: Brandyberry visited Gregg at Mercy Memorial Hospital on Saturday morning.
An electrical engineer will examine the mobile home for additional testing on Monday, Cartmill said.
